TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppDomainManager extends System.MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 提供非托管宿主的等效托管宿主。

span.span: Provides a managed equivalent of an unmanaged host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不要使用在 ASP.NET 中配置应用程序域。Do not use to configure an application domain in ASP.NET. 在 ASP.NET 中，配置必须由主机处理。In ASP.NET, configuration must be handled by the host. 实现类可以参与新的应用程序域的创建将托管应用程序。Implementing the class enables a hosting application to participate in the creation of new application domains. 若要替换默认，确定程序集和替换的类型APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_ASM 和 APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_TYPE 环境变量，或使用[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)并[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)配置文件中的元素。To replace the default , identify the assembly and type of the replacement in the APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_ASM and APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_TYPE environment variables, or use the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in your configuration file. 程序集必须是完全受信任，并且包含在全局程序集缓存或起始应用程序的目录。The assembly must be fully trusted and be contained in the global assembly cache or the directory of the starting application. 必须在环境变量中完全限定的类型和程序集名称。The type and assembly names must be fully qualified in the environment variables. 例如：For example: `set APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_TYPE=MyNamespace.TestAppDomainManager` `set APPDOMAIN_MANAGER_ASM=customappDomainmanager, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=f1368f7b12a08d72` > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果该程序集包含的子类取决于标记的条件性程序集(APTCA) 特性，您必须将传递到列表中包含这些程序集属性用来创建应用程序域。If the assembly that contains your subclass of depends on assemblies that are marked with the conditional (APTCA) attribute, you must include those assemblies in the list that you pass to the property of the you use to create application domains. 否则，使用条件性 APTCA 特性标记的程序集将被禁用。Otherwise, the assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute will be disabled. 为非托管主机的托管等效项。The is the managed equivalent of the unmanaged host. 对象参与的进程中的新应用程序域的创建，并可以自定义新其他托管的代码运行之前。An object participates in the creation of new application domains in a process and can customize the new before other managed code runs. 还可以提供主机管理器，从而参与公共语言运行时执行的其他方面。The can also supply host managers that participate in other aspects of common language runtime execution. 例如，可识别参与应用程序域的安全决定的对象。For example, an can identify a object that participates in the security decisions of the application domain. > [!NOTE] > 只有程序集授予`FullTrust`，例如全局程序集缓存中的程序集还是已标识为`fullTrustAssemblies`中方法中加载构造函数和方法。Only assemblies granted `FullTrust`, such as assemblies in the global assembly cache or identified as `fullTrustAssemblies` in the method can be loaded in the constructor and the method. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含一个链接要求和在类级别继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. 一个直接调用方或派生的类不包含基础结构权限时引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个非常简单的实现。The following example shows a very simple implementation of . [!code-csharp[System.AppDomainManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/CS/customAppDomainManager.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomainManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/VB/customAppDomainManager.vb#1)]

exception.span: 调用方没有正确的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the correct permissions.
See the Requirements section.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

permission.span: 为派生类，以可执行代码插入公共语言运行时托管基础结构。

span.span: for derived classes to plug executable code into the common language runtime hosting infrastructure.
Associated enumeration: .

summary.span: 获取应用程序激活器，该激活器用于激活相应域中的外接程序和基于清单的应用程序。

span.span: Gets the application activator that handles the activation of add-ins and manifest-based applications for the domain.
The application activator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 没有指定的单一实例中每个类激活调用路由到的所有外接程序和基于清单的应用程序。There is a single designated instance of the class in each to which all add-in and manifest-based application activation calls are routed. 为当前可以提供其自己的自定义，或默认值的实例创建。The for the current can provide its own custom , or an instance of the default is created.

param.name: state
param.span: 的一个子类，用来标识请求其安全状态的操作。

span.span: A subclass of that identifies the operation whose security status is requested.

summary.span: 指示是否允许在应用程序域中执行指定的操作。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified operation is allowed in the application domain.

returns.span: 如果宿主允许在应用程序域中执行 指定的操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the host allows the operation specified by to be performed in the application domain; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现返回`false`。The default implementation of this method returns `false`. 将调用此方法调用方法来增加独立的存储配额。This method is called when the method has been called to increase the isolated storage quota. 承载公共语言运行时 (CLR) 的应用程序可以重写方法来执行策略决策基于对象 (其继承)，并可以然后允许或禁止增加。An application that hosts the common language runtime (CLR) can override the method to perform policy decisions based on an object (which inherits ), and can then allow or prevent the increase. 例如，主机可能提示最终用户来批准或拒绝请求增加配额。For example, a host could prompt the end user to approve or deny the request to increase the quota. 主机的实现应考虑到拒绝服务攻击的可能性。The host's implementation of should take into account the possibility of denial-of-service attacks. 例如，它应提示用户，仅当用户启动的事件中调用该方法，如按钮单击。For example, it should prompt the user only if the method is called from a user-initiated event such as a button click.

span.span: A new or existing application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的友好名称`friendlyName`参数，可以显示在用户界面，以标识域中。The friendly name, specified by the `friendlyName` parameter, can be displayed in user interfaces to identify the domain. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 默认值方法调用受保护方法来创建。The default method calls the protected method to create the . 重写此方法不需要调用方法，但可以返回现有域。Overrides of this method do not need to call the method but can return an existing domain.

para.span: 继承自类并重写方法，您可以执行自定义应用程序域初始化活动之前调用方法或不调用根本的帮助器方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and override the method, you can perform custom application domain initialization activities before calling the method, or not call the helper method at all.

para.span: 例如，可以修改作为传递的证据，更新关联的字段，或重复使用现有的域。

span.span: For example, you could modify the evidence passed in as , update the fields of the associated , or reuse an exiting domain.

A newly created application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此受保护的帮助器方法处理新的应用程序域的创建。This protected helper method handles the creation of a new application domain. 此友好名称，由指定`friendlyName`参数，可以显示在用户界面，以标识域中。This friendly name, specified by the `friendlyName` parameter, can be displayed in user interfaces to identify the domain. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property.

for controlling evidence.

summary.span: 获取应用程序的入口程序集。

span.span: Gets the entry assembly for an application.

value.span: 应用程序的入口程序集。

span.span: The entry assembly for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序，清单激活的应用程序的入口程序集由应用程序清单。If the application is a manifest-activated application, the entry assembly is determined from the application manifest. 如果应用程序不是清单激活，入口程序集是默认应用程序域中的可执行过程。If the application is not manifest activated, the entry assembly is the process executable in the default application domain. 在其他应用程序域中，输入程序集是由已执行的第一个可执行文件方法。In other application domains, the entry assembly is the first executable that was executed by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使宿主可以提供参与应用程序域的安全决策。This property allows a host to provide a to participate in the security decisions for the application domain. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写的自定义应用程序域管理器的属性。The following example shows an override of the property for a custom application domain manager. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. param.name: appDomainInfo
param.span: 包含应用程序域初始化信息的对象。

span.span: An object that contains application domain initialization information.
Initializes the new application domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不使用此方法来初始化 ASP.NET 中的应用程序域。Do not use this method to initialize an application domain in ASP.NET. 在 ASP.NET 中，配置必须由主机处理。In ASP.NET, configuration must be handled by the host. 如果使用此方法以初始化应用程序域，主机会引发在尝试初始化应用程序域。If you use this method to initialize the application domain, the host throws when it attempts to initialize the application domain. 异常消息指示已发生的初始化。The exception message indicates that initialization has already occurred. 在构造函数后立即调用此方法。This method is called immediately after the constructor. 默认值实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation does nothing. 自定义实现可以设置内部的类和委托、 设置非托管的主机接口的接口或设置事件处理程序的新。A custom implementation can set up internal classes and delegates, set up an interface with the unmanaged host interface, or set up event handlers for the new . 此外，有关外接程序激活的自定义实现无法识别当前作为目标应用程序域。Also, for add-in activations, a custom implementation could identify the current as the target application domain. 从[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，可以使用此方法将默认应用程序域沙盒，在应用程序启动或修改新的应用程序域的沙盒。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you can use this method to sandbox the default application domain at application startup, or to modify the sandbox of a new application domain. 若要执行此操作，调整并上的属性对象分配给属性`appDomainInfo`之前初始化应用程序域。To do this, adjust the and properties on the object that is assigned to the property of `appDomainInfo`, before you initialize the application domain. > [!NOTE] > 只有程序集授予`FullTrust`，例如全局程序集缓存中的程序集还是已标识为`fullTrustAssemblies`中方法中加载构造函数和方法。Only assemblies granted `FullTrust`, such as assemblies in the global assembly cache or identified as `fullTrustAssemblies` in the method can be loaded in the constructor and the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写的自定义应用程序域管理器的方法。The following example shows an override of the method for a custom application domain manager. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.AppDomainManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/CS/customAppDomainManager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.AppDomainManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.AppDomainManager/VB/customAppDomainManager.vb#2)]
